messages.subject: Re: Pawel Novak
messages.msgSnippet: Hahahaha. Oh my goodness. So I succeeded in having his Yahoo account suspended. Took a lot of explaining, but great to see they did it. A small but satisfying
messages.messageBody:
Hahahaha. Oh my goodness.
So I succeeded in having his Yahoo account suspended. Took a lot of explaining, but great to see they did it. A small but satisfying victory.
Can someone please confirm the Gmail account he used in this email? Will do the same with that one too.
At least he doesn't get the replies that might take him up on his fraud.
Can reply to me directly instead of to the group. Thanks.

Brian

>
> I have 2 japanese swords (katana and tanto) for sale. Katana has a late XVIII century blade and tanto is from late XIX century. I can sell them for the reasonable price.
>
> Keep me inform if you could have an interest.
>
> Pawel,
>
> Shipwrecks.Research271275@...

messages.subject: Re: Pawel Novak
messages.msgSnippet: I ve just got one too, so I suspect everyone has got one.  This was discussed on the Nihonto Message Board recently so it seems our Dear Privateer Pawel is
messages.messageBody:
I've just got one too, so I suspect everyone has got one. This was discussed on the Nihonto Message Board recently so it seems our Dear Privateer Pawel is having a mass mailout...

Regards,
Barry Thomas
(Melbourne, Australia)

----- Original Message -----
From: David Zincavage
To: token_kenkyu_kai@...
Cc: nihontostudy@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Tuesday, July 28, 2009 11:26 PM
Subject: Re: Pawel Novak


By mail, I meant email. I have no idea how I got on his list.

David

----- Original Message -----
From: Tom Helm
To: token_kenkyu_kai@...
Cc: nihontostudy@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Tuesday, July 28, 2009 9:15 AM
Subject: Re: Pawel Novak


U.S. Mail = U.S. Postal Inspection Service
I would put the Feds onto this crook...
-t

Tom Helm
toryu@...
"Moriamur, et in media arma ruamus"
- Vergil





On Jul 28, 2009, at 5:59 AM, David Zincavage wrote:


This came in my morning's mail.

David Zincavage

------------------------------------

Hi,

A few days ago I have sent to you an email with information about 2 japanese swords I have for sale. I have a temporary problem with my Yahoo server and I send an email from my alternative Gmail email.

I have 2 japanese swords (katana and tanto) for sale. Katana has a late XVIII century blade and tanto is from late XIX century. I can sell them for the reasonable price.

Keep me inform if you could have an interest.

Pawel,

Shipwrecks.Research271275@...




[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]

messages.subject: Pawel Novak
messages.msgSnippet: This came in my morning s mail. David Zincavage ... Hi, A few days ago I have sent to you an email with information about 2 japanese swords I have for sale. I
messages.messageBody:
This came in my morning's mail.

David Zincavage

------------------------------------

Hi,

A few days ago I have sent to you an email with information about 2 japanese swords I have for sale. I have a temporary problem with my Yahoo server and I send an email from my alternative Gmail email.

I have 2 japanese swords (katana and tanto) for sale. Katana has a late XVIII century blade and tanto is from late XIX century. I can sell them for the reasonable price.

Keep me inform if you could have an interest.

Pawel,

Shipwrecks.Research271275@...


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
